TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAssemblyPostProcessor implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 定义方法，类可实现这些方法在生成程序集之后对程序集进行处理。

span.span: Defines the method a class implements to process an assembly after the assembly has been built.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口的类在编译后可以访问程序集。A class implementing this interface can access an assembly after it has been compiled. 类编译程序集, 然后检查是否已在 Web 配置文件中注册了接口。 The class compiles assemblies and then checks to see whether an interface has been registered in the Web configuration file. 如果是这样, 则实例调用接口的方法, 以便在编译后以及加载程序集之前执行任何操作。If so, the instance calls the method for the interface to perform any action after the compilation and before loading the assembly. 例如, 探查器工具可以实现此接口, 以在程序集中建立探测。For example, a profiler tool could implement this interface to establish probes in the assembly. 注册接口后, 将始终在调试模式下编译 ASP.NET 应用程序及其程序集。When an interface is registered, the ASP.NET application and its assemblies will always be compiled in debug mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建接口的实现, 并将其注册到 web 应用程序的 web.config 文件中。The following code example demonstrates how to create an implementation of the interface, and register it in the Web.config file of a Web application. 此代码示例的第一部分创建一个名为`Samples.Process.postProcessTest`的类, 该类实现接口。The first part of the code example creates a class named `Samples.Process.postProcessTest` that implements the interface. 此类执行调用方法时编写文件的简单操作。This class performs the simple action of writing a file when the method is called. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/CS/postProcessTest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/VB/postProcessTest.vb#1)] 使用命令`csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`将类编译为 .dll 文件。Compile the class into a .dll file with the command `csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`. 将生成的 .dll 文件添加到 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Bin 文件夹中, 并将 .dll 注册到 Web.config 文件中, 如下面的代码所示。Add the resulting .dll file to the Bin folder of an ASP.NET application and register the .dll in the Web.config file, as shown in the following code. ``` ``` 当用户访问该网站时, 将动态编译 Web 应用程序, 并将文件 MyTest 写入 C:\compile。When a user visits the Web site, the Web application is dynamically compiled and the file MyTest.txt will be written to C:\compile.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PostProcessAssembly(string path) cil managed

summary.span: 在加载程序集之前调用，可允许实现类对程序集进行修改。

span.span: Called before the assembly is loaded to allow the implementing class to modify the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在编译程序集后调用此方法。The class calls this method after the assembly has been compiled. 在加载程序集之前要执行的任何操作都应包含在此方法中。Any actions to be taken before loading the assembly should be included in this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建接口的实现, 并将其注册到 web 应用程序的 web.config 文件中。The following code example demonstrates how to create an implementation of the interface, and register it in the Web.config file of a Web application. 此代码示例的第一部分创建一个名为`Samples.Process.postProcessTest`的类, 该类实现接口。The first part of the code example creates a class named `Samples.Process.postProcessTest` that implements the interface. 此类执行调用方法时编写文件的简单操作。This class performs the simple action of writing a file when the method is called. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/CS/postProcessTest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.IAssemblyPostProcessor/VB/postProcessTest.vb#1)] 使用命令`csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`将类编译为 .dll 文件。Compile the class into a .dll file with the command `csc /target:library postProcessTest.cs`. 将生成的 .dll 文件添加到 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Bin 文件夹中, 并将 .dll 注册到 Web.config 文件中, 如下面的代码所示。Add the resulting .dll file to the Bin folder of an ASP.NET application and register the .dll in the Web.config file, as shown in the following code. ``` ``` 当用户访问该网站时, 将动态编译 Web 应用程序, 并将文件 MyTest 写入 C:\compile。When a user visits the Web site, the Web application is dynamically compiled and the file MyTest.txt will be written to C:\compile.
